knowledge.title: That's it! You took the first step!
knowledge.subtitle: Keep going down and know more about me and my work
knowledge.descriptionTitle: These is some of my knowledges
knowledge.sendAnEmail: Enter your email below and get a copy of my resume!

aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.content: Hello, nice to meet you! My name is Elder Dias Batista, I'm 23 years old and I live in Americana-SP. Programming is my biggest hobby, so I have done my job and today I act as a software developer. Below you will have a summary about my knowledges.

degree.title: Academic Degree
degree.content: My love for technology began in technical education at ETEC Polivalente of Americana. Already graduated in Computer Technician, I already had in mind what would be my degree! So, I graduated in Systems Analysis and Development from FATEC Americana.

currentJob.title: Current job title/company
currentJob.content: I currently work at IsCool App as a software developer. I work on the 'IsCool App' and 'IsCool Sync' software, participating in front-end, back-end and database development.

warnings.empty: Please, fill in the email to receive my resume.
warnings.invalid: Please, enter a valid email address.
warnings.error: Oops! I couldn't send you the resume. Please try again
warnings.ok: Very well! Now just access your email and you will have a copy of my resume!
warnings.alreadyReported: This email has already been registered and you will receive a copy of my resume!
